Uses of Package
com.adobe.pdfservices.operation.pdfjobs.params.ocr

  • Packages that use com.adobe.pdfservices.operation.pdfjobs.params.ocr 
    Package Description
    com.adobe.pdfservices.operation.pdfjobs.jobs
    Contains implementation classes and sub-packages for PDFServicesJob.
    com.adobe.pdfservices.operation.pdfjobs.params.ocr
    Contains the param classes for OCRJob.
  • Classes in com.adobe.pdfservices.operation.pdfjobs.params.ocr used by com.adobe.pdfservices.operation.pdfjobs.jobs 
    Class Description
    OCRParams
    Parameters for converting PDF to a searchable PDF using OCRJob.
  • Classes in com.adobe.pdfservices.operation.pdfjobs.params.ocr used by com.adobe.pdfservices.operation.pdfjobs.params.ocr 
    Class Description
    OCRParams
    Parameters for converting PDF to a searchable PDF using OCRJob.
    OCRParams.Builder
    Builds an OCRParams instance.
    OCRSupportedLocale
    Supported locales for OCRJob
    OCRSupportedType
    Supported OCR types for OCRJob
